Afro Sheen™'s story was founded in the 1960s by George E. Johnson with his wife Joan to introduce high-quality hair care products into the African American market. His entrepreneurial spirit revolutionized the industry with hair products for African-American men and women.

December 3, 2024 - Johnson Products Company (JPC) is a privately held American business based in Chicago, Illinois. It is best known for manufacturing a line of hair care and cosmetic products for African American consumers under the names Afro Sheen and Ultra Sheen.
